attributes.action: SAVE OUR COUNTRY STOP IMMIGRATION NOW
attributes.additional_details:
IF WE DONT STOP IMMIGRATION TO OUR COUNTRY THE BRITISH WAY OF LIFE WILL DISAPPEAR.
WE HAVENT THE JOBS OR HOUSING  AT THE PRESENT  TO TAKE  ANYMORE NEW PEOPLE , WHAT KIND OF FUTURE WILL OUR CHILDREN HAVE IN AN OVER CROWDED COUNTRY.  IS THERE A POLITICIAN OUT THERE  WITH THE GUTS TO STAND UP FOR WHAT THE MAJORITY OF THE POPULATION WANTS  AND STOP IMMIGRATION NOW .
